Package antichess.viewgui

Interface Summary
BoardView BoardView is a container for rendering Boards and accept input.
 

Class Summary
ChessBoardView ChessBoardView is the graphic representation of a Board for use in the view.
ChessGUI ChessGUI is a GUI for displaying a game of Chess, Antichess, or any other chess game that uses a ChessBoard.
ImageMap ImageMap is a class for loading and storing images.
LoadGameWindow LoadGameWindow handles selecting the options for loading new games.
MoveHistoryView MoveHistoryView displays the history for a ChessBoard.
NewGameWindow NewGameWindow handles the creation of new games.
TimerLabel A TimerLabel is a JLabel automatically refreshed by a ChessClock It displays the time in a minutes:seconds format.
